summary: Premium skincare e-commerce website for Cosmata brand - science-backed, dermatologically tested skincare focused on glowing, healthy skin with a minimal, luxury, clinical aesthetic targeting women aged 18-35 in India
architectural_notes: Design system: soft beige (#F5EFE8), white, subtle gold accents (#C9A96E) with rounded corners and soft shadows
Typography: modern serif for headings, clean sans-serif for body text
Content tone: confident but clean, premium simple English, no exaggerated medical claims, conversion-focused
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Premium hero image showing glowing Indian woman with skincare serum bottles in soft luxury lighting, minimal clinical aesthetic (hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Close-up skin texture image showing healthy glowing skin for ingredient section (skin-texture.dim_800x600.png)
- Before acne skin photo for comparison slider, realistic clinical photography (before-acne.dim_600x800.png)
- After clear skin photo for comparison slider, same subject as before photo, realistic result (after-clear.dim_600x800.png)
- Minimal serum bottle product image on white background with soft shadow (product-serum.dim_400x400.png)
- Minimal cleanser bottle product image on white background with soft shadow (product-cleanser.dim_400x400.png)
- Minimal moisturizer jar product image on white background with soft shadow (product-moisturizer.dim_400x400.png)
- Minimal face wash tube product image on white background with soft shadow (product-facewash.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a sticky header with Cosmata logo on the left, navigation menu (Home, Shop, About, Blog, Contact), and icon group on the right (search, account, cart). Use soft beige (#F5EFE8), white, and subtle gold accents (#C9A96E). Implement sticky scroll behavior.

Build hero section with left-aligned text: headline 'Glow Naturally. Clinically Proven.', subtext 'Reveal your healthiest skin with Cosmata's science-backed skincare solutions.', primary CTA 'Shop Now', and secondary CTA 'Explore Collection'. Right side displays premium product image. Use modern serif font for headings and clean sans-serif for body text.
Add trust badge section with 3 horizontally aligned icons and labels: 'Dermatologically Tested', '100% Safe Ingredients', '24/7 Customer Support'. Use minimal rounded design with soft shadows.

Create 'Shop by Category' section with 4 category cards: Serum, Cleanser, Moisturizer, Face Wash. Each card should have minimal rounded design with elegant product imagery, using soft shadows and rounded corners.

Build best sellers product grid with 4 products per row on desktop. Each product card includes: product image, product name, short benefit line, price, and 'Add to Cart' button. Add 'Best Seller' urgency tag. Implement hover effects on buttons.

Create ingredient highlight section with split layout: left side shows close-up skin texture image, right side displays benefits of Vitamin C, Kojic Acid, and Niacinamide with short scientific explanations in simple English.
Add before & after section with image comparison slider showing realistic acne-to-clear skin results. Include disclaimer text: 'Results may vary'.
Build testimonials section with 3 customer review cards. Each card includes 5-star rating and short genuine review text. Use clean minimal card design with soft shadows.
Create blog preview section with 3 skincare tips article cards. Use clean minimal card design consistent with site aesthetic.
Build footer with newsletter signup form, quick links section, social media icons, contact details, and secure payment icons. Use brand color palette and maintain premium minimal aesthetic.
Implement cart functionality: users can add products to cart, view cart contents, update quantities, and proceed to checkout. Store cart state globally.
Ensure fully responsive design with mobile-first optimization. Implement smooth scroll behavior and hover effects on all interactive elements (buttons, cards, links).

Apply consistent brand design system throughout: soft beige (#F5EFE8) backgrounds, white content areas, subtle gold accents (#C9A96E), rounded corners, soft shadows, strong white space, and premium minimal aesthetic. Use modern serif font for headings and clean sans-serif for body text.
